detail_desc: Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Make-up bag in transparent plastic with a print motif. Zip with a tab at the top. Size 15x21 cm.
Fitted T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a round neckline that has a small opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and cuffs with two buttons. Unlined.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long nightshirt in a cool, patterned viscose weave with rounded notch lapels and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Parka in soft washed denim with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Metal earrings with sparkly stones. Length 3.5 cm.
Block-coloured sports swimsuit with a zip at the top, small collar and long raglan sleeves. Lined at the front and gusset.
Soft, non-wired, push-up bra with decorative straps and moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and no fasteners.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave containing some linen. Smocking with a small frill trim at the top, short raglan sleeves, decorative buttons down the front and covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Striped jumper in a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Short dress in a slightly stretchy weave with a boat neck, concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist with a decorative metal buckle at the front and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Lace balconette bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in light sweatshirt fabric with a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Trousers in woven fabric with one welt back pocket, a concealed zip in the side and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit.

T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front, sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeve-ends and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. UNICEF does not endorse any company, brand or product.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Mesh shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Wide, straight-style jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, low dropped shoulders, long, close-fitting sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a print motif and a matching helmet. The costume has a stand-up collar with a padded edge, zip down the front and elasticated hems. The helmet has a hook and loop fastening at the front.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from approx. 1 cm to 2.5 cm.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves with metal buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs with coin-shaped pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length 45-53 cm.
Straight-cut blouse with a smocked stand-up collar and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a frill and smocking at the cuffs.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.

Sleeveless dress in pleated, glittery tulle with wide satin shoulder straps and a wrapover bodice. Press-studs and a detachable satin bow at the back, a seam at the top and a double-layered tulle skirt for added volume. Lined.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with pointelle details, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Double ribbed trim around the neckline, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Earrings in metal, straw and fabric with tassels. Length 16.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué at the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with creases and slits at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Printed swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti straps and embroidery at the top. Lined at the front.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a round neckline and buttons at the back of the neck. Long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant. Length 55-70 cm.
Jacket in cotton piqué with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and appliqué on the front. Zip down the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trim around the sleeves and neckline.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Narrow elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Suede sandals with a front strap with a decorative bow, heel strap and ties that can be wound around the ankles. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Cardigan in a soft cotton knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections and a concealed drawstring at the waist with a key pocket in the waistband.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey. Width 6 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Calf-length skirt in jersey crêpe with a high waist.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 48x170 cm.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a sheen. Elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dresses in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flounced skirt.
Lace push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather with glittery soles. Adjustable straps over the foot and a hook and loop tab at the back. Moulded imitation suede insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jacquard-knit socks in a stretch cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Elasticated waist. Unlined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
